UPDATED TO V2
now has 3 type of bombs 
1# destroys anything
2# destroys only boxes (with player push)
3# destroys boxes and enemies does not hurt teammates (with player push and bombs are blue and red depending on team)

This is a bomb from bomber man right click to spawn a bomb it will explode doing 100 dmg you only can spawn  one bomb at a time 4 second fuse once planted
